name: lagu_kesukaan
pattern: (\bkau\ adalah\ segalanya\b|\bcinta\ sejati\b|\bkau\ yang\ terindah\b|\bberhenti\ berharap\b|\bperih\b|\bkarena\ ku\ sanggup\b)

name: solat
pattern: (\bsolat\ subuh\b|\bsolat\ zuhur\b|\bsolat\ ashar\b|\bsolat\ maghrib\b|\bsolat\ isya\b|\bsolat\ dhuha\b|\bsolat\ tahajud\b|\bsolat\ istikharah\b|\bsolat\ hajat\b)

name: tujuan_solat
pattern: (\bmendapatkan\ cahaya\ pada\ hari\ kiamat\b|\bterapi\ jantung\ dan\ pencernaan\b|\bpahala\ dua\ kali\ lipat\b|\bmempercepat\ dikabulkan\ doa\b|\bmendapat\ pahala\ setara\ dengan\ melaksanakan\ shalat\ malam\b|\bmemperlancar\ rezeki\b|\bdikabulkan\ doa\ dan\ diampuni\ dosa\b|\bmendapatkan\ petunjuk\ dari\ allah\b|\bkeinginnan\ cepat\ dikabulkan\b)
